thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Ineos says hopes to restart Britain's oil Forties pipeline overnight

title: Ineos says hopes to restart Britain's oil Forties pipeline overnight
text:
February 7, 2018 / 4:27 PM / Updated 31 minutes ago Ineos says hopes to restart Britain's oil Forties pipeline overnight Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON, Feb 7 (Reuters) - 
* Ineos, operator of the Forties oil and gas pipeline, said a feed control valve closed at its Kinneil facility at around 1020 GMT, leading the main pipeline system to close. 
* “We have now identified the issue that caused this and are hoping to resolve it this evening. We then plan to start-up again overnight,” an Ineos spokesman said. (Reporting By Susanna Twidale, edited by Nina Chestney)
